column4: what tool do you guys use to merge 2 existing file system. my root  directory under /dev/sda6 is full so i want to merge my /dev/sda7 to expand /dev/sda6. any idea?
i have another dev as home. my home seems to have lot of space but not the root directory
gparted can do that. ah, so figure out subdir in / is taking up the most room and put that on sda7
